title: Bobby And Amy Discuss The Protests + Amy Had Serious Talk With Her Kids + Bobby Gives His Answer To Raymundo’s Bachelor Party
itunes:title: Bobby And Amy Discuss The Protests + Amy Had Serious Talk With Her Kids + Bobby Gives His Answer To Raymundo’s Bachelor Party
description:
Bobby and Amy talk about the protests over the weekend and respond to messages about why they didn’t ‘speak up sooner’. Amy had a talk with her two kids about what's going on in the world and answered their questions. Plus, Bobby also gives an answer to Raymundo about going to his bachelor party this month!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
